comments:
Description:
DataException when preview attached report in Web Viewer.

Build number:2.1.2.v20061215

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview attached file in bug #143630 in Web Viewer and html

Expected result:
Preview are ok.

Actual result:
Preview in html was ok without errors.
Preview in Web Viewer will show DataException.

Error log:
The following items have errors:

Data (id = 240):
- Invalid expression to retrieve value in presentation.

data.engine.InValidExpr ( 1 time(s) )

It is model's bug. One nested table with data set binding to Orders data set has a column binding to dataSetRow["CUSTOMERNUMBER"], which is not an output column of Orders data set.
Make changes to wrong bugzilla entry. Correct it.
Fixed in source.The bug is introduced by a programming mistake which populate the column bindings of query definition after the query definition is created. This is fixed.

traces.message: Invalid expression to retrieve value in presentation.
